title: omme neneyalu
sahitya:
omme neneyalu namma dEva


anupallavi

  gammane Odibaruva bommanayyanu bEga


caraNam 1    paNaDarinAthanu pANDavara mitranu koNDADuvara mane toNDanAguvanu 
    caraNam 2    vayyAra naDegAra hoilu mADuva cOra muyyakke muyya tekhava ayyanayya
    caraNam 3    uttama puruSanu mattEnembe nAnu etta nODidaru attatOrutalirpa
    caraNam 4    saccidAnanda rUpa heccAgi salahuva muccAgi bhajipara acyutAnanda krSNa
    caraNam 5    sankarSaNa nAma tande purandara viTTalana sankIrtane mADe sungava kELa yama
